sections.heading: 01|Hospitalization of mentally ill definitions
sections.text: Effective:September 30, 2025Latest Legislation:House Bill 96 - 136th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in this chapter and Chapter 5119. of the Revised Code:(A) "Mental illness" means a substantial disorder of thought, mood, percepti

sections.heading: the Revised Code apply to persons received in a hospital operated by the department of behavioral health on a voluntary application.
